posts.post_content:
An amazingly powerful card that single-handedly sculpts the type1 metagame. If you're not the one resolving it, you're losing.
  
   
Best Tinker targets as of this posting:
  
[Darksteel colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel colossus), because he gets it done in two turns, and goes back to the deck if they deal with him.
  
[Inkwell leviathan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inkwell leviathan), because everyone has Islands, and shroud is difficult to get around.
  
[Sphinx of the Steel Wind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sphinx of the Steel Wind), because it's the hardest to race, and is immune to [Goblin Welder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Welder)
posts.html:
An amazingly powerful card that single-handedly sculpts the type1 metagame. If you're not the one resolving it, you're losing.

Best Tinker targets as of this posting:
Darksteel colossus, because he gets it done in two turns, and goes back to the deck if they deal with him.
Inkwell leviathan, because everyone has Islands, and shroud is difficult to get around.
Sphinx of the Steel Wind, because it's the hardest to race, and is immune to Goblin Welder

posts.post_content:
A tutor is supposed to put the card into your hand, NOT the battlefield and certainly not for 3 CMC!
  
Additional cost by saccing an artifact... WTF were they thinking? Is this extra cost meant to make it balanced?
  
Just broken, don't use this unless you want to be an a sshole, this is basically an "I-Win" button.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Platinum angel seems like a really silly choice for this card, there are hundreds of artifacts I'd rather have collossus, inkwell leviathin, sphinx of the steelwind, Darksteel Forge, who cares if you can't lose the game on turn three. Your opponents are going to care if you have a 11/11 trampling indestructible on the field turn three. Turn one, ornithopter, black lotus, badda bing badda boom Freekin collossus. They play a plains. You swing for 11. They play an island, they play a storm crow. You swing for 9. Game, without playing a land.
